value.title: CRUSHING requirements with Small Multiples in Power BI
value.excerpt: Check out how using Small Multiples in Power BI can help you CRUSH requirements and satisfy business requests to make amazing reports! Patrick also has a neat trick for you.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-small-multiples  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Discovering data within Power BI and quickly EXPORT!
value.excerpt: Sometimes you just don't know what data is out there in Power BI. Patrick shows you how you can discover data available to you and also how to quickly export that data! Even with just a Pro account!  Data discovery using the data hub https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/connect-data/service-data-hub?tabs=datasets
